titles.title: CB 37 I will sing unto the Lord as long as I live

properties.copyright: Â©1972 His Eye Music Multisongs (EMI Christian Music Publ. BMG Music Publishing)

verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
I WILL SING UNTO THE LORD AS LONG
AS I LIVE;
I will sing praise to my God while I have my being.
My meditation of Him shall be sweet; I will sing
praise, I will sing praise to the Lord.
Bless thou the Lord, O my soul.
Praise ye the Lord. (4x)
